summary: Abandoned in the barren wasteland of Kyoto, a savage, enraged orphan does whatever it takes to survive in the wild. When he crosses paths with civilization, he must learn to tame the beast within.
cast: Tesshô Genda|Megumi Hayashibara|Hiroaki Hirata|Yoshihiro Ike|Kin'ya Kitaôji|Yû Mizushima|Masako Nozawa|Bin Shimada|Kaori Yamagata|Kappei Yamaguchi
title: Ashura
